chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 mini has a problem:
Good evening, I ordered an iPhone 12 mini on Sunday. The estimated delivery date was yesterday, but I still haven't received any notification that it's been shipped. I'd like to know if there's any issue. Thank you
Thank you,

Hello ecomobile,

We wanted to let you know that Andoni has not received your order.

Can you tell us if the order has been shipped and with what tracking number?
In case the order has not been shipped yet, please ship it and provide a valid tracking number, or refund the order in less than 1 business day.

If you have shipped the order but it has been lost, we will collect documentation from the customer and send it to you. We will let you know if the customer prefers a refund or reshipment.

If the shipment goes back on track, no refund will be issued and the order will be considered delayed.

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns: we look forward to hearing from you.

Thank you for your help,

Veronica, Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare, 

We are getting ready to ship the parcel and want to ensure everything's perfect. Can we quickly reconfirm the customer's address?

Your satisfaction is our priority, and this small step helps us guarantee a seamless delivery experience. Just a moment of your time could prevent any delivery issues. 

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW

Dear Backcare,

We have shipped out the device to the customer.

Here is the tracking number: 1ZBF1560D901196515

Please note that as the courier has just picked up the parcel, it might take a while before it is accurately displayed on their website.

In the meantime please do not refund.

If you initiate a refund while the product is being shipped, we will lodge a case with SSC.

Regards,
HB

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer. If the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
JY
